Package pec

Class Event

java.lang.Object
pec.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Event>, IEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
AntMoveEvent, EvaporationEvent, SimulationReportEvent
public abstract class Event extends Object implements IEvent, Comparable<Event>
The Event class represents an event in the simulation. It implements the IEvent interface and provides common functionality for managing event time and event type.
